page.title: 03A Ladock Farmer's Day 8.7.85
page.content:
At 6.00 am. he woke and went straight to do his{yard work.}He gave the calves water, milked the cows and put the calves in to feed from the cows. Afterwards he put the calves back in their houses and turned the cows out into their field.
At about 8.00 am. he had his breakfast and then at 9.00 am. he went out into the field to{combine the barley.}The combine harvester cuts and threshes the corn and puts the straw in bales. The grains are put into sacks.
At 1.00 pm. his wife brought his dinner out to him and he continued combining until he went in for his dinner at 6.30 pm. His{mother}did the yard work in the evening and after dinner he went on{harvesting the {barley until nearly midnight.
